content:
Hello,
Looking for help on a few topics. Currently developing a prototype product label FHIR Document.

  1. Is there a way to download the XML version of each resource? I’m currently copy/pasting the XML from the XML tab of the Resource Content. I see XML on the downloads page but that is for examples and I’m looking for the ‘template’ resource without content.
  2. Is there a basic or common style sheet that works with all Resources (particularly for documents)?

Craig Anderson said:

Hello,
Looking for help on a few topics. Currently developing a prototype product label FHIR Document.

  1. Is there a way to download the XML version of each resource? I’m currently copy/pasting the XML from the XML tab of the Resource Content. I see XML on the downloads page but that is for examples and I’m looking for the ‘template’ resource without content.
  2. Is there a basic or common style sheet that works with all Resources (particularly for documents)?

Here: http://build.fhir.org/downloads.html
